title: Tracings And Blueprints, ca. 1830
description:
Three walls of a painted panel room, copy of "La Petite Singerie" by Christophe Huet in the Chateau of Chantilly, France, by M. Belhomme.

Left wall consists of ogee framed mirror panel over enframed painted dado followed by two similarly framed painted panels of monkeys disporting themselves in fashionable human activities, one panel in riding, one in gathering fruit from a tree, each panel over an enframed painted dado.

Rear wall consists of ogee framed centered mirror panel over enframed painted dado, flanked by two similarly framed painted panels, one of monkeys in the bath with attendants, and one of a game of cards, each over an enframed painted dado.

Right wall consists of two ogee framed painted panels of monkeys in the boudoir followed by a similarly framed mirror panel, each over an enframed painted dado.

tombstone.epitaph: Tracings And Blueprints, ca. 1830. gelatine and paper. 1923-2-2-a/o.
